title: Significance Of Injuries To Contenders, Jerami Grant Trade Ideas
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Bobby Marks and Ohm Youngmisuk to talk Kevin Durant’s injury timeline, potential trades for the Nets, the significance of Draymond Green’s back injury, if Paul George can come back this season, the importance of the Clippers making a playoff push, if Detroit should trade Jerami Grant and where he may land.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: KD And Draymond Green's Injury Timelines, Potential Jerami Grant Trades
